title: ODi vandu aruLvAn
sahitya:
Odi vandu aruLvAn Om murugA enrAl nADiya nalam aDaiya nAm avanai nADumunnE


anupallavi

  sADum tan vElai Evi sharaNam enbOrkku IdillAt-tuNai tanai IndiDum vElan


caraNam    pADu pala mEnmElum paTTup-paTTE manam vADuvOr vElaniDam vandaDi paNindAl
Adum tan mayilukku AnaiyiTTavar paDum kEDellAm ODat-tuNai koDuttaruLvAn
